檔.definition: (bound form) shelves (for files); pigeonholes; (bound form) files; crosspiece (of a table etc); (bound form) (of goods) grade; vendor's open-air stall; (Tw) timeslot for a show or program; classifier for shows; classifier for events, affairs etc; Taiwan pr. [dang3]

檔期.definition: slot within a schedule; timeslot (for a TV program, a session with a photographer etc); range of dates in which an event is to be held (film screening, exhibition etc)

檔案傳輸協定.pinyin: dang4 an4 chuan2 shu1 xie2 ding4

檔車.definition: see 打檔車|打档车[da3 dang3 che1]
